title: Ollie by Schizotype released
content:
Schizotype releases "Ollie", a retro script signage font. Available now at [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141842/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/ollie/) with a 30% discount until Valentine's Day.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Ollie%20Typophile_5454.jpg)
author: daverowland
